  <description>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108965</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108965</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plane mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flache Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Miroirs plats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espelhos planos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specchi piani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθρέφτες αεροπλάνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espejos planos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how the inverted writing on the front of an ambulance appears to be the correct way round when viewed from the rear-view mirror of the vehicle preceding the ambulance.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ambulance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rear-view mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie das umgekehrte 
Schreiben auf der Frontseite eines Krankenwagens scheint, die korrekte
Methode zu sein, die wenn es vom rear-view Spiegel des Trägers rund 
ist, der, den Krankenwagen vorangeht angesehen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment l'écriture 
inversée sur l'avant d'une ambulance semble être la voie correcte 
ronde une fois visualisée du miroir rétroviseur du véhicule 
précédant l'ambulance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como a escrita 
invertida na parte dianteira de uma ambulância parece ser a maneira 
correta redonda quando vista do espelho rear-view do veículo que 
precede a ambulância.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come la scrittura 
invertita sulla parte anteriore di un'ambulanza sembra essere il modo 
corretto rotondo una volta osservata dallo specchio rear-view del 
veicolo che precede l'ambulanza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς το γράψιμο στο 
μέτωπο ενός ασθενοφόρου εμφανίζεται να είναι ο σωστός κύκλος 
τρόπων όταν εμφανίζεται από τον οπισθοσκόπο καθρέφτη του 
οχήματος που προηγείται του ασθενοφόρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo la escritura 
invertida en el frente de una ambulancia aparece ser la manera 
correcta redonda cuando está vista del espejo retrovisor del 
vehículo que precede la ambulancia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krankenwagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahldiagramm</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
